Title: A Solstice Carol
Plot: During Winter Solstice, Xena and Gabrielle visit a town where it's Scrooge-like King has deemed that celebrating the holiday is a crime.
GuestStars: Daniel James, Junior Chile, Peter Vere-Jones, Joe Berryman, Sheri Booth, Gennieve Lucre, Jaimee Kaire-Gataulu, Nicko Vella, Tony Bishop
